name: qotd
author: adminelevation
description: A cog that provides a question of the day feature for your Discord server.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the Question of the Day cog. Use `[p]qotd` to get started.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores the channel ID, time, timezone, role ID, enabled categories, current question, response count, and last asked time for the QotD feature. No other user data is stored.
